Html:
Hi all,

How is it possible to control column width on a per column basis in ColumnSeries? Is it possible at all?

I was thinking about subclassing ColumnSeries class and override UpdateDataPoint method. Can I do it at all?

I welcome any suggestions.

Thanks in advance.

kamil

Subclassing ColumnSeries doesn't seem to work. No matter what I do it always set width to all the columns.
